column5: Beautiful 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath Beachfront Condo at Saida Towers  This stunning, beachfront condo is located at one of the Island's more popular resorts. You will love all of the Texas-sized amenities the resort has to offer. Relax at one of the 3 pools, have a drink at the pool-side bar (open seasonally), play a game of tennis or enjoy a day on the beautiful beaches of the island.
column8: 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath Beautiful Condo at Saida Towers
